name: Infiltrator (itch) (noirie)
description:
A duo of bounty hunters are hired to dismantle an undercover mechanization project currently being pursued by the government overruling a foreign planet. In order to receive their pay,  Omega must break into five different facilities across the planet and retrieve the various prototypes of a particular machine that has his client on pins and needles.

Infiltrator is a fast-paced platforming game made in Unity. Infiltrate grungy, sci-fi-inspired locations, steal alien machines from various sites, and escape with your mission objective complete.

Controls:

  • Use the arrow keys (or WASD) to move.
  • Press spacebar to jump.
  • Press enter to read debriefs.
  • Touch objects to collect them.

Credits:

  • Level design, auxiliary code, and all assets by Madeleine "Marin" Clark.
  • Base code by Michael Baker.
  • Music composed and produced by Jack Flamini, used with permission.
